scripts.cy:run:with:report: (npm run cy:run || true) && npm run report:open
scripts.pages:update: (npm run cy:run || true) && mv -f docs/history allure-results/history || true && npm run report:generate -- --clean && rm -rf docs && cp -R allure-report docs
scripts.report:history: mv -f docs/history allure-results/history && rm -r allure-report || true
